name: Worx Nitro 20V 18GA Cordless Brad Nailer, Cordless Nail Gun, Nail Gun Battery Powered, Up to 2 Inch, Tool-Free Jam Release, Trimming & Molding, Baseboard WX842L PowerShare – Battery, Charger Included
short_description: ADVANCED NAILING POWER: Electric nail gun uses NailForce Air Impact Technology to secure brad nails up to 2" into hardwood. Perfectly versatile for a wide range of uses—such as fastening panel molding, window trim, small baseboards, and more

SAME BATTERY, EXPANDABLE POWER: The same Power Share batteries that run this cordless brad nailer can conveniently be used with 140 plus power tools, outdoor power equipment, and lifestyle products from the Worx Power Share platform
RAPID FIRING: Electric nail gun fires up to 80 nails per minute to complete jobs at a fast, efficient pace

CORDLESS FREEDOM: Leave behind the hose, compressor, and gas cartridge hassles of pneumatic nail guns. Enjoy the convenient flexibility with this battery-powered cordless nailer that streamlines nail firing with innovative Air Impact Technology
CLEAR JAMS QUICKLY: Battery nail gun is equipped with a tool-free jam release that easily clears stuck nails so you can keep firing without interruption

IMPROVED NAIL SAFETY: Compared to other products on the market, this cordless nail gun offers greater peace of mind with its anti-ejection design that keeps nails from flying when you open the magazine or jam clearing is required

RELOADING MADE EASY: This electric nail gun features a quick-load magazine to save time with effortless reloading. The gun’s low nail indicator will let you know when it’s time reload. Dry fire lockout prevents firing when magazine is empty
TWO-FIRING MODES: Use Contact Actuation Mode for rapid bump firing. Switch the cordless nailer to Single Sequential Mode for precise, sequential nail placement
ENHANCED COMFORT and CONTROL: The cordless brad nailer has a micro-textured rubber grip to enhance comfort and control for fatigue-free nailing
INCLUDES: (1) 20V Cordless 18GA Brad Nail Gun, (1) Belt Clip, (1) Carry Bag, (200) 1.5" 18GA Brad Nails, (1) 20V 2.0Ah Battery, (1) 2A Charger
product_description: Fasten brads quickly and precisely with the Worx NITRO 20V Cordless 18GA Brad Gun. Powered by a Power Share™ 20V lithium-ion battery, this high-efficiency brad nailer uses impressive NailForce Air Impact Technology to fire up to 80 nails per minute to complete projects swiftly. With a 2.0Ah battery, this nailer can set up to 500 nails on a single charge so you can breeze through a variety of common woodworking applications—such as fastening baseboards, window and door trims, crown moldings, hardwood flooring, fence panels, cabinetry, and more. Whatever the task, this battery-powered brad nailer is designed to minimize interruptions with its tool-free jam release. When nail jams happen, simply lift and unhook the release lever to clear the jam. Set nails properly on every shot using the tool-free depth adjustment dial—an easy solution for preventing damage to work surfaces. The 20V brad nailer offers two firing modes to set your nailing pace. Use the Contact Actuated, or Bump Mode, to rapidly fire brads for productive fastening. Use the Single Sequential Mode when you need fire nails one by one for greater precision. To further help with precision placement, this brad nail gun features a narrow nose design that helps maintain a clear line of sight during application. Dual LED lighting also helps boost visibility in dark areas—such as under cabinetry or in shadowy corners—to enhance overall accuracy. When the nail gun is out of brads, the low nail indicator will let you know it’s time to reload. Keep the work moving with the easy-to-use quick-load magazine. Dry firing lockout prevents the nail gun from operating when brads run out so that you don’t waste time firing an empty magazine. While this 18-gauge cordless brad nailer packs a lot of force, it’s still engineered to be easy on the user. With a micro-textured rubber grip, you can fire for extended periods without sacrificing comfort or control. The tip of the gun is also outfitted with a non-marring pad that prevents damage to work surfaces.

name: NEU MASTER Nail Gun Cordless with Battery Powered - 18 Gauge 2 in 1 Brad Nailer/Staple Gun, 20V Max. 2.0Ah Battery & Charger, 800 Nails & 200 Staples Included
short_description: 【Cordless Portability】Experience the freedom to work anywhere with NEU MASTER cordless nail gun. Enhanced by spiral-driven technology, this brad nailer allows to tackle projects without being limited by cords. No Cord, No Limit

【Versatile 2-in-1 Design】Nail gun cordless with battery drive 1/4'' Narrow Crown Staples from 5/8'' to 1'', and 18 Gauge Brad nails from 5/8'' to 1-1/4''. The Nail gun battery powered is your go-to for woodworking, thin-trim work, upholstery installation, DIY projects like building pet houses. and so on

【Safety First】NEU MASTER nailer gun prioritizes safety with a durable Contact Safety design that requires full depression against the working surface, preventing accidental nail firing and ensuring your safety on every job [Release Safety Lock ONLY when LED lights up — then pull the trigger to work]

【Efficient Battery Technology】The cordless staple gun features an upgraded 2.4A charger that accelerates the charging time of the 2.0Ah battery. It also optimizes your work pace with the capacity to drive up to 2,000 nails on a single charge, enhancing productivity

【User-Friendly 】The NEU MASTER 18 gauge brad nailers illuminate the work area in low-light conditions with built-in LED light. Plus, hang the nailer conveniently with the belt hook when not in use, ensuring safety and easy access during your projects
NEU MASTER Tools Hotline: Stuck with a tool issue? Don't wait for business hours. CALL us at (+1) 8332711088. Our professional techs got your back - 24/7 tool troubleshooting.

name: WEN 61722K 18-Gauge 2-in-1 Pneumatic 2-Inch Brad Nailer and 1/4-Inch Crown Stapler
short_description: Shoot 18-gauge brads ranging from 5/8 to 2 inches long
Fire 1/4-inch crown staples ranging from 5/8 to 1-5/8 inches long
Features a depth adjustment wheel, a fastener gauge, a rotating exhaust, a 1/4-inch 18 NPT air inlet, and a quick release 100-fastener capacity magazine
Hassle-free nose latch makes clearing jammed fasteners quick and easy
Includes a hard-shelled blow mold carrying case for easy transportation and storage
product_description: Remember when your nailer was a stapler? Or maybe you prefer your stapler to be a nailer? Either way you look at it, I didn’t get much sleep last night. The WEN 18-Gauge 2-Inch 2-in-1 Pneumatic Brad Nailer and Stapler offers versatility and reliability all in one compact design. Shoot 18-gauge 1/4-inch crown staples ranging from 5/8 to 1-5/8 inches in length or 18-gauge brads ranging from 5/8 to 2 inches long. The spring-loaded magazine makes for quick and easy reloads with enough space to hold up to 100 fasteners. The lightweight body combined with the rubber-lined handle limit fatigue during long days on the job. Operating pressure ranges from 60 to 100 PSI with the nailer consuming 0.5 CFM of air per magazine at 80 PSI. The 1/4-inch 18 NPT air inlet allows for quick connection to your favorite air compressor. Adjust the firing depth with a simple turn of the depth adjustment wheel and easily check the remaining fasteners through the gauge window on the side of the magazine. The adjustable air exhaust lets users exhaust air in any direction, while the powder-coated finish prevents wear and tear to the nailer’s body. This package also includes a blow mold carrying case for easy transportation and storage. And, because its a WEN product, your 2-in-1 nailer comes backed by a two-year warranty and a friendly customer help line. Remember when your brad nailer could shoot staples? Remember WEN.

name: Milwaukee Electric - M18 Fuel 18 Gauge Brad Nailer
short_description: Efficient: The combination of our POWERSTATE Brushless Motor and REDLINK PLUS Intelligence delivers you with unmatched fire rate with zero ramp-up time keeping you efficient throughout your day

Brad Nailer: Leveraging our nitrogen air spring mechanism, the Brad nailer allows you to consistently sink nails to the proper depth in hard and soft woods while leaving clean nail holes matching the head of the nail
Consistent, clean nail holes, Zero ramp-up time, Tool free drive depth adjustment
No gas cartridge required, Sequential and contact actuation firing modes
product_description: Milwaukee 2746-20 M18 FUEL 18 Gauge Brad Nailer (Tool Only)

name: SKIL PWR CORE 20 Brushless 20V 18Ga Brad Nailer Kit including 2.0Ah USB-C Battery and Charger-NA1800B-10
short_description: 20V CORDLESS BRAD NAILER KIT - Set includes a 2.0Ah lithium USB-C battery, 45W USB-C PD charger, (100) 18-gauge 2-inch nails, (2) no-mar tips
BEST-IN-CLASS RUNTIME - Drives up to 1,000 nails with the included 2.0Ah battery on a single charge
EXCEPTIONAL PERFORMANCE - Delivers high power and drives up to two nails per second with minimal ramp-up time
DUAL LED LIGHTS - Increases visibility in dimly lit work areas
QUICK DEPTH ADJUSTMENT WHEEL - Easily sets ideal nailing depth
COMPACT AND LIGHTWEIGHT - For working in tight spaces with minimal fatigue
DRY FIRE LOCKOUT - Eliminates blank firing and prevents damage to work surfaces
TOOL-FREE JAM CLEARANCE - For easy access to clear nails in case of a jam
COMPATIBLE WITH A WIDE RANGE OF FASTENERS - Accepts 5/8-inch to 2-1/8-inch 18-gauge fasteners
MODE SELECT SWITCH - Choose between sequential and bump mode
product_description: Ditch the hoses and compressors with the cordless SKIL PWR CORE 20™ Brushless 20V 18Ga Brad Nailer Kit. This 20V cordless nailer delivers best-in-class runtime by driving up to 1,000 nails on a single charge with the included 2.0Ah battery. It features a powerful brushless motor that drives up to two nails per second with minimal ramp-up time. Dual LED lights help increase visibility when working with the nail gun in dimly lit work areas. Its quick depth adjustment wheel allows you to easily set the ideal nailing depth when driving fasteners, and the battery-powered nail gun is compact and lightweight for working in tight spaces with minimal fatigue. Choose between sequential and bump modes with the mode select switch. Dry fire lockout eliminates blank firing and prevents damage to work surfaces, while tool-free jam clearance offers easy access to clear nails in case of a jam. The finish nailer accepts 5/8-inch to 2-1/8-inch 18-gauge fasteners.

name: meite 18 Gauge Brad Nails, 1-1/4 Inch 18GA Brad Nails Galvanized Small Finishing Nail Gun Nails for Pneumatic, Electric Brad Nailer Gun (1,000 Counts)
short_description: [What’s in the Box] Contains 1,000 counts 1-1/4" length 18 gauge brad nails (Type 18G). The individual plastic packaging for safe delivery.

[High Quality] Made of high quality steel. These brad nails are relatively thin and sharp chisel points, causing minimal damage when inserted into wood, thus preserving the integrity and easy to hide and giving your handicrafts or artwork a great look.

[Galvanized Finish] Bright galvanized surface with resistance to rust and corrosion, highly popular in interior decoration. You can rely on their performance. (Tip: If it is an application that requires frequent contact with water, we recommend the use of stainless steel brad nails.)
[Compatible Tools] Compatible with various brands of 18G manual, electric and air/pneumatic brad nailer. (Please check that the nails are compatible with your nail gun before purchase)

[Wide Appications] Fine wire brad nails are easy to hide and give your handicrafts or artwork a great look. Ideal for use on window trim, cabinet building, picture frame assembly, sofa fabrics, wood box, carpet, leather/textile, car seating, joinery and upholstery. Able to meet your nailing needs in furniture making, interior decoration and other DIY projects.

name: BOSTITCH Brad Nailer 18 Gauge/Narrow Crown Stapler, 2-in-1 (SB-2IN1)
short_description: Electric brad nailer drives both 18-gauge brads and narrow crown finish staples for ultimate versatility
Adjustable depth guide of 18 gauge brad nailer sets nails to desired depths quickly and conveniently
Tool-free adjustable exhaust conveniently directs exhaust away from the user
Kit includes: Nailer, 1/4-inch Air Fitting, Carrying Case, Extra No-Mar Tip and Oil
product_description: This 18 GA 2-in-1 Brad Nailer/Finish Stapler Kit is versatile and convenient with its ability to drive both brads and narrow crown finish staples to your desired depth. Use this kit for interior and exterior finish and trim, furniture, cabinet work, and more.

name: WORKPRO Pneumatic Brad Nailer, 18 GA, 2 in 1 Nail Gun and Crown Stapler, with 400pcs Nails/ 300pcs Staples, for Carpentry, DIY Project, Woodworking
short_description: Professional Nail Gun: The brad nailer is air-powered, which needs to be connected to an air compressor (NOT INCLUDED). It's much more efficient than manual tools. Pressure: 60 ~ 100 PSI. Air inlet: 1/4 NPT

2 IN 1 Nail/Staple Gun: This practical multi-functional nail/staple gun, is compatible with 18 gauge brad nails and 18 gauge staples. Including 400pcs brad nails/ 300pcs staples. Staples length: 5/8”-1-9/16” (16 mm-40 mm); Nail length: 5/8”-2” (15 mm-50 mm)
Depth Adjustable: Rotating the depth control wheel could adjust the depth of nails/staples. Firing depth adjustment helps protect the work surface and is suitable for various materials

Great Design: 360-degree adjustable exhaust, quick and tool-free jam cleaning, continuously shot mode, a great tool for your upholstery and woodworking. Note: Add oil regularly is needed for all air tools (lubricant included)
Multipurpose: Ideal for upholstery, woodworking, flooring, roofing, molding, door and window installation, etc. Meets you all needs of your family DIY

name: CRAFTSMAN V20 Cordless Brad Nailer, 18 Gauge Nail Gun, with Battery and Charger (CMCN618C1)
short_description: Drives adhesive collated 18 GA finish nails with this cordless finish nailer
ELIMINATES THE NEED: Fully cordless design eliminates the need for compressors, hoses or costly gas cartridges
CLIMATE CONDITIONS: Provides consistent firing power in various climate conditions and materials
CONSISTENT RESULTS: Tool-free depth settings for quick set up
IMPROVED EFFICIENCY: Tool-free jam and stall settings for ease of use
OPTIMAL BALANCE: Lightweight with optimal center of gravity providing optimal balance and comfort in hand during use
DDED COMFORT: Contoured over-molded handle
CONVENIENCE: Belt hook for added access and storage
product_description: V20* 18GA Cordless Brad Nailer Kit (1 Battery) is designed to eliminate the need for compressors, hoses, or costly gas cartridges. The powerful motor delivers consistent firing power in various weather conditions and materials while the single tool-free depth setting allows you to adjust the nail depth quickly. A contoured over-molded handle and lightweight design helps minimize user fatigue during prolonged usage.
